There really is no ironing needed. Which for me is important.  No matter how hard I try or plan, I'm always running behind. It comes in 31 colors, so I bought a back up in dark grey.  My work shirts used to be $70-$90, considering the only real difference is the brand. I wasted a lot of money. Great find !

评论概述: Crisp tailored look, but bad chemical smell
评论详情: The shirt looks very nice and a little more stylish than a standard button-down. Fabric is a bit stiff and has a sheen too it (at least when it is new). It has a pretty bad chemical smell that did not come out with one wash. Getting a little better with additional washing using detergent, fabric softener, and starch that are all scented to cover it up. The long cuffs are a nice touch. I am 5'8"-5'9" and 165 pounds. Shirt is very fitted on me without being skin tight, but without the long cuffs, the sleeves would be too short.

First of all, the packaging was a reminder of days gone by when companies cared and customer service was a real thing! It came in a nice box and folded with care! The material is a nice texture and the fit is perfect! I think I need a black one as well!

评论概述: I will be ordering more Colors
评论详情: I love this shirt it is exactly what I have been looking for. The fabric is soft and not see thru. I am a 40 GGG and it is hard for me to find button shirts that don't gap in the front. This one does not have that issue, and I love that it is tapered because I have a small waist and back so it fits perfect. I  am in the process of losing weight so the size I purchased is a little snug so I will wear it with a sweater or vest until I lose a little bit more and it not so snug. This is a must have item.

I’ve been looking for a white blouse for a couple years. Have bought some and returned or tried on and never purchased.  I’m not much of a “blouse person” - I like tees and pullover tops and sweaters, but wanted a good white blouse. This one is FINALLY the one that works! It’s loose enough to not pull across my bust, but tapered in the sides so it doesn’t look baggy. The material is soft and comfortable, not see- through. I’m 5’2”, 139 lbs, bought a medium and it’s nearly perfect- the sleeves are a tiny bit long, but I turned the cuff back once and it’s perfect- and it looks good that way. Very happy with this blouse! (Might even look for it other colors!) Would highly recommend!!
